about_the_game:
STORY

Din Dino used to be the most dangerous hired gun in town. But after experiencing a life of danger and crime, they decided that they had enough. Din Dino is going to pursue their true dream: making custom t-shirts. After “inheriting” a t-shirt store that’s falling apart and overrun by debt, they'll try to keep the store in business by getting to know their clients and their preferences, seeing their stories unfold, and turning the store into a merch empire. But things won't be that easy, and it seems that new foes and old partners will try to bring them down. Will Din Dino achieve their dreams... or will they succumb to their fate?

THE GAME

  • Meet a colorful cast of dinosaurs and other prehistoric animals!

  • Design custom t-shirts for your clients! They will each have their preferences and expectations, and some will have stories to tell... But only if your t-shirts are good enough!

  • Choose from many stickers to customize the t-shirts while completing minigames that will either make or break the t-shirt depending on your performance!

  • Upgrade your store to make the manufacturing process faster... and more profitable!

  • Earn reputation to get more clients to come visit the store, and earn money to pay your debt and improve your store.

name: K!CHIN
short_description: Play as Din Dino, once part of the mob, who abandons their violent life to pursue their true passion: selling custom t-shirts. Make personalized designs, get to know your clients, and fight to keep your business afloat while you pay off the enormous debt contracted with your old boss, Al Sapone!
